step.cmd: In the CLC, enter the following command.

stepresult.p: The process starts the database upgrade. Eucalyptus returns output similar to the following example.
stepresult.codeblock: Starting Eucalyptus services: Attempting database upgrade from 3.1.2 at /var/lib/eucalyptus/upgrade/eucalyptus.backup.1326904600... # UPGRADE INFORMATION #================================================================================ # Old Version: 3.1.2 # New Version: 3.2.0 # Upgrade keys: false using: # Upgrade configuration: false using: # Upgrade database: true using: upgrade_db # Same version: false using: # Start upgrading: db Upgrading your database... . . . # Done upgrading: db done. [debug:0387] redirecting stdout to //var/log/eucalyptus/startup.log and stderr to //var/log/eucalyptus/startup.log done.
stepresult.note: You might see some warnings in the output. These are a known issue.

stepresult.codeblock: Starting Eucalyptus services: Attempting database upgrade from 3.1.2 at /var/lib/eucalyptus/upgrade/eucalyptus.backup.1326905005... # UPGRADE INFORMATION #================================================================================ # Old Version: 3.1.2 # New Version: 3.2.0 # Upgrade keys: false using: # Upgrade configuration: false using: # Upgrade database: true using: upgrade_db # Same version: false using: # Start upgrading: db CLC is disabled. Skipping DB upgrade. # Done upgrading: db done. [debug:0387] redirecting stdout to //var/log/eucalyptus/startup.log and stderr to //var/log/eucalyptus/startup.log done.

step.cmd: After all cloud components have resumed, set the blockstoragemanager parameter on each SC server. See Configure the Storage Controller for more information.

info.p: [partition] should be set to the name of the partition on which the storage device is located. If you are not using subscription SAN support, [device] should be set to overlay. Otherwise, you must set this to the appropriate value for your SAN device, as follows:

ul.li: emc-vnx-flare31 - for EMC VNX Provider running FLARE v5.31
